bioconda.name: bioconductor-reder
bioconda.summary: Interactive visualization and manipulation of nested networks

biotools.summary: R-based package combined with a stand-alone Java application for interactive visualization and manipulation of modular structures, nested networks and multiple levels of hierarchical associations.

bioschemas.name: RedeR
bioschemas.summary: R-based package combined with a stand-alone Java application for interactive visualization and manipulation of modular structures, nested networks and multiple levels of hierarchical associations.
